recipe.title: Spinach Artichoke Casserole
note: I used to make this every Thanksgiving and Christmas.
instructions: Squeeze spinach until dry. Mix artichoke hearts, spinach, salt, cream cheese, butter, milk and lemon juice. Pour into 9 x 13 in. greased backing dish. Sprinkle with pepper to taste and Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350Â° for 30-40 mins.
